Author: Teechep Bird
Name: FATE Helper
Description: Displays a list of all FATEs in the current area with: time remaining, percent completed, and bonus marker. Clicking on the FATE name will flag it, and automatically teleport you to the closest aetheryte (if it's faster than flying there). NOTE: this plugin does not track specific FATEs. You can add the Sonar plugin to track those.
Punchline: Makes FATEs suck slightly less, guaranteed! Disclaimer: atma drop rates will continue to suck.
